page.title: 03RANDOLPHFIELD POLICE STATION
page.content: {Randolphfield}was built in 1975 and controls all of{Central Region.}It has 40_50 rooms housing all aspects of a modern{Police Force.}As you enter reception the variety of help offered is vast.Apart from cells and interview rooms you can find a museum,gym, multi_gym,lost and found,wireless dept canteen and identification room.They have a road safety section which visits schools and clubs and a major incident room for unusually large disasters.There is a mobile accident unit,an underwater unit which travels all over Scotland and a dog section, trained for multipurpose help,apart from drug and explosive sniffing.In the main control room imformation about police whereabouts and records of public note are kept on a computer. Other departments concentrate on finger prints,photographs and traffic.
